participant_1.background:
I'm trying to appreciate the simple things in life, like the weather.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
i like to water ski.

participant_2.background:
I'm worried about my kids getting sick because of the cold weather.
i broke my nose in 5th grade.
i often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
i met my birth mother when i was sixteen.
i drive a restored mustang.

content.text: I'm doing well, how are you?
I'm doing good, thanks! Just trying to enjoy the nice weather.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm a little worried about my kids getting sick because of the cold weather.
That's understandable. I hope they stay healthy!
Thanks, me too! So, what are you up to today?
I'm just working on some lessons for my students. I'm using my laptop to work on them while I'm at the park.
That sounds like a fun way to work! I often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
That's really great! I'm glad you're passionate about something.
Thanks! I am. I met my birth mother when I was sixteen, and she's been a big influence in my life ever since. She's really passionate about activism, so I've learned a lot from her.
That's wonderful! I'm glad you have a good relationship with her.
Thanks, I am too. So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet! I'm thinking about going water skiing. Do you like to do any water sports?
I love water sports! I used to water ski a lot when I was younger.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try it. Maybe we can go together sometime.
